Translations.Text: Seg issekniyen iS, ssfinat di yill, amzun d idurar
Ma ihwa yaS ad Issens avu, ad eebsent, d tusbivin sufella s. War ccekk, ayagi d issekniyen i yal aueboi isnemmiren
Ne$ a ten Issenger ilmend n wayen kesben. Aias i Ipsemmie
Ad eoen wid ipnamaren $ef issekniyen nneÂ£, ar ur asen illi ssoan
Ayen akw i wen ippunefken n wayla, d zzhu n tmeddurt di ddunit. Ayen illan ar Oebbi, yif it; ad idum kteo, i wid iumnen, ippeklen $ef Mass nnsen
wid ijunben ibekkaven ibararen, akked laao, u ssurufen i wid i ten isserfan
wid id ipjawaben i Mass nnsen, peallan, ppemcawaoen $ef lameo nnsen, pseddiqen seg wayen iten N$at
wid, ma iusa ten lbe$wv, ad qablen
Aqeiii n tucmip, d tucmip i p icban. Win isemmeen, issweqmen, arraz is ar Oebbi. Neppa, ih, ur Ieemmel ara imednas
Ma d wid id irran ppao mi pwadensen, ur telli tiyta degsen
Tiyta, kan, deg wid ivuooen imdanen, iqehoen di tmurt, war ssebba. I wigi, aaaqeb aqeoean
Ma d win iueboen, isemmeen, ayagi, s tidep, d aseyyi n lumuo
Win Itlef Oebbi, ur isai bab, deffir eS. A pwaliv imednas, mara eoen aaaqeb, ad inin: "ma illa ubrid n tu$alin
